pullrequest.title: Fix compilation with sdformat default branch

content.raw:
Oh, I forgot to mention how I made all these changes. I did some test builds to find which headers were missing, then used some fancy sed/grep to see which files were using these symbols without including the header file. For example, the following shows which files reference `boost::function.hpp` without referencing `boost/function.hpp`:

~~~
grep -L boost/function\.hpp `grep -rlI boost::function .`
~~~

I also used some sed tricks to try to insert the `#include` statements in logical places, but it wasn't automatic by any means.
